text: This is a list of awards and decorations received by Kim Il-sung, founder and first leader of North Korea. According to North Korean sources, Kim Il-sung had received 230 foreign orders, medals and titles from 70 countries since the 1940s until, and after, his death in 1994. ==North Korean== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:left;" |- ! colspan=2 width="490px" | Award or decoration !
